Reviews.Title: false advertising
Reviews.Author: Erika Kitty
Reviews.Content: purchased a "new" "oem" phone from "The OEM Shop."phone I received is not new, and does not have an oem battery or manual.their user profile says they only sell NEW - OEM products.This is the response I got from them when I wrote to complain about receiving a phone which is not new, nor completely oem:"We do sell original OEM products but the phones we sell are not OEM. I truly apologize for any inconvenience this has caused.Jackeshia WashingtonCustomer Relationship SpecialistThe OEM Shop5620 1st Avenue, 4th FlBrooklyn, NY 11220"I really hope Amazon marketplace makes them change their deceptive ways.

Reviews.Title: Good back in 2000 in 2011 this is extint
Reviews.Author: Mike Kay "Peace"
Reviews.Content: I bought one to travel oversees and use this. However, like most motorola products I have dealt with, this is no exception. The battery life is more like 4 hours tops. I would have to keep this phone on charge more than I did use it. I can just say I am glad I got rid of mine!If you want battery power, don't get this.
